2.0.name: wordpress/select-and-share
2.0.description: This plugins makes possible for your readers to share pieces of content from your site in the following social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Orkut, Delicious, Hotmail, LinkedIn, Yahoo!, MySpace, and also on WordPress and on e-mail. You also will have the option to follow stats on the texts that are being shared and the reach in each social network.
